name: Boars and Barricades
description:
A game made for the GBJam #8

The goal is to survive a certain time against a hoard of infected stags and boars.

You also need to cut trees and plant seeds to get ressources.

You can build barricades to slow down and damage the animals.

The camp can also be upgraded to get more life and attack.

You can also heal with the care kit.

For buildings, W is the number of wood and L the number of leather.

Use left and right to move, Z to shoot an arrow, X to make a secondary action like cutting wood, planting a new one or building your camp. Use spacebar to choose this secondary action (select button).

Game made using Godot Engine 3.2.1

Graphics made with Krita

Sound effects made with sfxr

Font made with Fontstruct
